sentence.text: There has been virtually no tissue study on the expression of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in prostate cancer (PCa).

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: This study aimed to investigate the expression of PLZF by immunohistochemistry in different grade as well as metastatic mitochondrial transport and to correlate the alteration of PLZF expression with PCa aggressiveness.
